synopsis.text: Of the spotless and charming TV announcer, Kunieda Kei, two starkly contrasting personalities coexist. In the public eye, he's a flawless prince, but behind closed doors, he's a hot-headed and blunt individual. Kei's life takes an unexpected turn when he crosses paths with Tsuzuki Ushio, a talented stop-motion animator, who accidentally discovers Kei's hidden persona. To make matters more complicated, Kei finds himself helping Ushio with his work, all while concealing his true identity. As they spend more time together, Kei grapples with the fear of his secret being revealed and the hope that someone might embrace both sides of him. Will this unlikely relationship blossom, or will Kei's secret tear them apart?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
